metadata.title: CVE-2021-47151 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:interconnect: qcom: bcm-voter: add a missing of_node_put()Add a missing of_node_put() in of_bcm_voter_get() to avoid thereference leak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
